doc.field: 73rd Regiment of the New York State Volunteers records
73rd Regiment of the New York State Volunteers records

The Ordnances and Stores series includes various forms and correspondence relating to the ordnances and stores of the 73rd Regiment. The series includes receipts, issues, returns, certificates of destroyed or abandoned goods, and documents relating to the settlement of returns. The Settlement of Returns folder contains correspondence and forms concerning the settlement of returns for the 73rd Regiment, including letters from the Ordnance Office of the War Department, letters from the Auditor's Office of the Treasury Department, and Statements of Discrepancies.
73rd Regiment of the New York State Volunteers records
